name: damning

A damning report, judgment, remark, etc. that includes a lot of criticism or shows clearly that someone is wrong, guilty, or has behaved very badly: He made some fairly damning remarks about the government's refusal to deal with the problem. The two men were convicted on some extremely damning evidence. Synonym
